TopicTitle: when will the some reassembly required up date will be on x box

Articles.Content: i know its on pc but I'm a littlie impatient because I want to build a probe in orbit
I heard somewhere updates come out 12-18 months after PC gets them, which fits because we’re still around 1.8/1.9
ksp enhanced edition is ported over to console by blitworks I checked there site not much info but yeah 12 to 18 months to long
